title: Episode 569 - Booze And Drugs Still Left?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss what Dan’s Child Day Care would be like, consider what the future of movie theaters may be post-coronavirus, why podcasts are so successful, the latest moral issues surrounding opening the US back up amidst coronav...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss what Dan’s Child Day Care would be like, consider what the future of movie theaters may be post-coronavirus, why podcasts are so successful, the latest moral issues surrounding opening the US back up amidst coronavirus fears, and the two close the show by answering viewer’s questions.
